onboarding.pinMinLength: PIN yi fanele ku va na switsundzuxo swo tsongo-tsongo swa 6

onboarding.createDescription: Veka vito na PIN ya wallet leyi. PIN yi tsala xilotlelo xa wena xa xihundla endhawini.
onboarding.createDescriptionAdd: Wallet yin'we na yin'we yi na vito ra yona, swilotlelo swa yona, na PIN ya yona.
onboarding.keysDisclaimer: Swilotlelo swi tsalwa hi wallet yin'we na yin'we naswona a swi humi eka xitirhisiwa xa wena

settings.signOutConfirm: U ta huma. Swilotlelo swa wallet ya wena swi tshama swi tsariwile eka xitirhisiwa lexi. U nga nghena nakambe nkarhi wihi na wihi.

pin.tooManyAttempts: Minringanyeto yo tala leyi tsandzekeke. U nga huma u nghena nakambe.
